Item.Description:
|sHtml|
  • DataGrid LinkColumn on a template threw an exception
  • Script Variables Editor in Property Grid caused an exception
  • Event Info not updating in Designer
|eHtml|

|sHtml|
  • Feedback feature
  • Improved Query handling
  • Updating application from Designer overwrites settings of the generated application
  • Notification action
  • Save and Cancel was re-introduced on the dialogs
  • Separated filename from Virtual Directory name
  • No data being returned is now handled as an empty value and not as a problem / exception anymore.
  • Introduced a delete button on editors displaying a list of items
  • Stabilized the Upload Application feature on the Admin site.
  • TextBox now renders out an input if it is specified to only have 1 line. Previously, it would always render out a textarea.
  • RadioButtonList defaults can now be set using a single string coming from a query
  • Improved the Login screen
  • Menu and toolbar changes
  • 'Add a query' button was removed from the Form Wizard
  • Show a clearer message to the user when a sql error occurs
  • On scripting, allow placing other actions after a GetFile action
  • Queries and Stored Procs are now grouped per connection in the Application Explorer
  • The Query Editor is now being displayed on the Canvas instead of a popup
  • IIS Express Port specified in the config file was not used
  • RadioButtonList with no default value caused a script error
  • GetFile action failed to open pdf files
  • GetFile action did not stop executing the script when it failed
  • FileUpload control did not clear the filename from the textbox after upload
  • Queries specified but not being used in the application should not cause errors during generation
  • Query failed when using a page parameter that is not present in the QueryString
  • Renaming Query Parameters incorrectly updated them in the sql text
  • Certain query parameter types caused errors during runtime
  • An exception occurred when using the Form Wizard on a datagrid found inside of a panel
  • Transparent panel borders did not take the theme into account
  • Stadium did not successfully convert strings to Guid's
  • Menu control: submenu items could not be deleted via the Menu Items Editor
  • Form Wizard threw an exception if the focus was on a folder in the Application Explorer
  • Cannot paste to the page canvas if the page was selected via the tab at the top of the canvas
  • Copy paste issue regarding Layout Table control
  • Error occurred when clicking on the Event Validation
  • Double clicking a Decision Condition Validation did not open the Conditions Editor
  • Drag drop issues
  • The DropDown control jumped around when clicking on it in the Stadium Designer
  • Issue around the Context Menu when moving from grid column to the page
  • The canvas jumped up when adding controls to the LayoutGrid
  • Canvas jumped when selecting controls
  • ReferenceCombobox with parameters caused property grid alignment issues
  • On the Admin Site, the 'Enter' key should not add a newline when editing a connection on the Settings page
  • Several other bugs were fixed
|eHtml|

|sHtml|
    |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Themes for the generated websites|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Quick Form Generation|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Templates|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Application Security|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Settings can now be set on the site itself, and not only via the designer|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • ODBC Preparser - Parameters can now be defined using sql syntax, e.g. @myParameter, instead of the normal '?' character|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Improved behaviour surrounding validations|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • In addition to the "generate & browse", it is now possible to only generate the code|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Application, pages, folders and scripts can now be renamed directly from the Application Explorer|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Underscores (_) are allowed in all names|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Ctrl+W will close the active canvas|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Dialogs can be resized|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Usability improvements|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Lots of other bug fixes|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|

|sHtml|
    |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Bug Fix: Ensure renamed ODBC parameters aren't overwritten every time the solution loads. Note: refreshing the query fields and parameters will still overwrite them|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Remove validation on Empty Data Grid Column Header|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|

|sHtml|
    |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Bug Fix: IE11 specific - Scripts on Link columns now work correctly|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|

|sHtml|
    |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Apply Bootstrap styled themes to the Generated Web Apps. There is one default theme for now, more to follow soon|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Layout Grid control based on the Bootstrap Grid concept. Allows for precise placement of controls on the page|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • New look and feel for the designer|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Easier to view and map parameters on properties|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Menu validation removed if child items are added to a parent item|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Faster File Load time|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Remove Result/Error wrapper from Web Service response|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Write out all the web service errors|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Improved top and bottom padding in the designer|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Smaller controls for easier viewing|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Auto scroll to the bottom of the designer when placing a new control below the last control|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Fix Add Query/Connection/Constant to to the top of the grid|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Improved scrolling on the Queries/Connections/Constants pages|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Better error messages in the designer|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Bug Fix: Expose Query parameters on script input parameter mappings|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|

|sHtml|
    |sHtml||sHtml|
  • ODBC Connections and text queries are supported (for databases like MySQL, DB2, PosgreSQL) - Setup a User DSN for connecting in the Designer and a Service DSN for connecting via the server. Parameters are specified using a ? and display as Parameter1, Parameter2 etc in the Designer (eg select * from Products where ProductId = ?)|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Cut Copy Paste has been reintroduced - works on Pages, Scripts, Controls and Actions - When copying individual controls/actions across pages/scripts, page/script specific mappings will be lost|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Validation messages in the designer for unmapped properties and events - Double click on the validation to bring the control into focus. Once the property has been mapped, the validation disappears|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Upgrade to .net Framework 4.6 - The installer will download and install it if needed|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Upgrade to IIS 10 Express - The installer will download and install it if needed to run Generated Apps (no IIS on the PC)|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Create a default Stadium5 App Pool and run all uploaded applications through it|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Required Field Validator added to Checkbox List|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Redesign of the Query Editor - See your parameters and fields on one screen|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Rename query parameters - Useful for ODBC queries where all parameters are written as '?' in the query and displayed as Parameter1, Parameter2 etc in the Designer|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Manually pull query fields and parameters - They will no longer automatically refresh|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Connections - Only persist if a server or dsn is specified|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Queries - only persist if SQL has been specified|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Toolbox Controls listed in one section|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Visible And Read-Only properties on Checkbox, Checkbox List, Date Picker, Drop Down, Panel, Radio Button List and TextBox can now be set using Query Fields, Page Parameters and Constants as well as a static True/False value|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Better handling of Images|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Fix security permissions errors when the Designer is not run as an Administrator|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Right-click context menu on open tabs with options to close all, float and dock tabs, close current tab and close all but this|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Security Certificate Updated|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|

|sHtml|
    |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Improved designer performance - opening, saving, deploying and working with files|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Simpler Install process|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Default save location for sapz files and created web applications changed due to security issues with saving to Program Files|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Stadium Server (localhost/Stadium5) has been removed|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • New Controls - Image, Radio Button List, Checkbox List, Checkbox|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • New Properties on existing form controls: Label, Label Position, Read-Only, Visible|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • New Action - ForEach|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Events moved off controls into a separate events window linked to the page|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Text Properties: One Click places cursor, 2 selects closest word, 3 selects entire value|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Only prompted to save the file if there have been changes|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Support for Oracle Text Queries|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Changes made in pop-up editors are saved immediately|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Stadium Header and icon removed from uploaded applications|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Fix: Upload applications when using IIS Express|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Fix: Grid Wrap with long values|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Fix: Allow Double Quotes and apostrophes to be passed from constants into scripts|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Fix: Attempt to load as much information in a corrupted file rather than stopping it from opening all together|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|

|sHtml|
    |sHtml||sHtml|
  • More prominent Browse Application Button|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Tool tips on properties|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Display decision conditions on the canvas|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Better handling of potential IIS Directory name clashes|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|

|sHtml|
    |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Installer downloads and installs the prerequisites if needed - .net Framework 4.5 and IIS Express 8.0|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • One Click from the Designer to browse to your application|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • New Layout Control - Table|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Default Date Property added to Date Picker|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Link form control validations to Buttons and Links|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Add Variables and Output parameter to the script when you need them|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Add Parameters, Queries and Constants when you need them|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • One click open of pages and scripts|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Two clicks will keep the page open|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • One click open of connections, queries and constants|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • sap and sap.config files combined into one .sapz file|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • New icons|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Help links embedded in the designer|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
  • Default Theme of uploaded applications changed|sHtml||sHtml|
    • |sHtml||sHtml|
